messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([A-Za-z ]+,\s*)*[A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine a class of 15 students. Vivian, Salma, Shanshan, Vadim, and Gongxue are all connected to each other. Paul, Solomon, Soheil, Gongxue, and Alice are connected to each other. Pierre, Abdul, Durga, Ajit, and Soheil are all connected to each other. Noah, Salma, Shanshan, Vadim, and Anisha are connected to each other. Solomon, Soheil, Gongxue, and Alice are connected to each other. Abdul, Durga, Ajit, and Anisha are connected to each other. Salma, Shanshan, and Vadim are connected to each other. Soheil is connected to Alice. Durga, Ajit and Anisha are connected to each other. Shanshan is connected to Vadim. Gongxue is connected to Alice. Ajit is connected to Anisha. What is the shortest connection path from Vivian to Ajit? Please list the student names in order, separated by commas.

Step 1: Identify the groups of connected students.
Group 1: Vivian, Salma, Shanshan, Vadim, Gongxue
Group 2: Paul, Solomon, Soheil, Gongxue, Alice
Group 3: Pierre, Abdul, Durga, Ajit, Soheil
Group 4: Noah, Salma, Shanshan, Vadim, Anisha
Group 5: Solomon, Soheil, Gongxue, Alice
Group 6: Abdul, Durga, Ajit, Anisha
Group 7: Salma, Shanshan, Vadim
Group 8: Soheil, Alice
Group 9: Durga, Ajit, Anisha
Group 10: Shanshan, Vadim
Group 11: Gongxue, Alice
Group 12: Ajit, Anisha

Step 2: Identify the starting point (Vivian) and the end point (Ajit).
Starting Point: Vivian (Group 1)
End Point: Ajit (Groups 3, 6, 9, 12)

Step 3: Identify the groups containing the starting and end points, and find any overlapping students.
Vivian: Group 1
Ajit: Groups 3, 6, 9, 12
Overlapping students: None

Step 4: Find any students from the starting group that are connected to students from the groups containing the end point.
Group 1: Salma and Gongxue
Group 3: Salma (Group 4) and Soheil (Group 2, 5, 8)

Step 5: Identify the shortest path from Vivian to Ajit using the connected students.
Path 1: Vivian -> Salma -> Soheil -> Ajit (3 connections)
Path 2: Vivian -> Gongxue -> Alice -> Soheil -> Ajit (4 connections)

Answer: Vivian, Salma, Soheil, Ajit

expected_answer: Answer: Vivian, Salma, Noah, Anisha, Ajit
Answer Vivian, Shanshan, Noah, Anisha, Ajit
Answer: Vivian, Vadim, Noah, Anisha, Ajit
